resources.string: These settings apply to all chat members using Delta Chat. However, they may copy, save and forward messages or use other e-mail clients.

Remote images can be used to track you.

The setting also allows loading fonts and other content. Even if it is disabled, you may still see embedded or cached images.

Load remote images?
Can\'t find an app to handle this type of data.
Are you sure you want to delete \"%1$s\"?
Share location with all group members
Messages in this chat are generated locally by your Delta Chat app. Its makers use it to inform about app updates and problems during usage.

Welcome to Delta Chat! ‚Äì Delta Chat looks and feels like other popular messenger apps, but does not involve centralized control, tracking or selling you, friends, colleagues or family out to large organizations.

Technically, Delta Chat is an e-mail application with a modern chat interface. E-mail in a new dress if you will üëª

Use Delta Chat with anyone out of billions of people: just use their e-mail address. Recipients don't need to install Delta Chat, visit websites or sign up anywhere - however, of course, if they like, you may point them to üëâ https://get.delta.chat
This requires a compatible app or a compatible browser on both ends.
You invited to a video chat.

If a video chat instance is defined, you can start a video chat from each chat. Video chats require a compatible app or a compatible browser on both ends.\n\nExamples: https://meet.jit.si/$ROOM or basicwebrtc:https://your-server
Use \"%1$s\" to invite others to video chats?\n\nOnce set, you can start a video chat from each chat. This will replace the previous setting for video chats, if any.
You are invited to a video chat, click %1$s to join.
Are you sure you want to leave this group?

plurals.name: ask_delete_chat
plurals.item: Delete %d chat? It will no longer be shown in the chat list, its messages will remain on the server.
Delete %d chats? They will no longer be shown in the chat list, their messages will remain on the server.

resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

plurals.name: ask_delete_messages
plurals.item: Delete %d message here and on the server?
Delete %d messages here and on the server?

resources.string: Exporting attachments will allow any other apps on your device to access them.\n\nContinue?
Block this contact? You will no longer receive messages from this contact.
Unblock this contact? You will once again be able to receive messages from this contact.
Delete contacts?\n\nContacts with ongoing chats and contacts from the system\'s address book cannot be deleted permanently.
Delete contact %1$s?\n\nContacts with ongoing chats and contacts from the system\'s address book cannot be deleted permanently.
Cannot delete contacts with ongoing chats.
Do you want to open this link?

Send message to %1$s:

‚Ä¢ It is okay if %2$s does not use Delta Chat.

‚Ä¢ Delivering the first message may take a while and may be unencrypted.
Send a message. It is okay if %1$s does not use Delta Chat.
In a broadcast list, others will receive messages in their private chats with you.\n\nThe recipients will not be aware of each other.
Others will only see this group after you sent a first message.
Tap and hold to record a voice message, release to send
Empty inbox.\nPress \"+\" to start a new chat.
You can chat with other Delta Chat users and with any e-mail address.
All chats archived.\nPress \"+\" to start a new chat.
If you archive chats, they will be shown here.

‚Ä¢ Forward messages here for easy access

‚Ä¢ Take notes or voice memos

‚Ä¢ Attach media to save them
You cannot write because you are not in this group. To join, ask another member.
This chat contains locally generated messages. Therefore you cannot write any messages.
Sending messages in mailing lists is not supported yet
Changes on mailing list name and image apply to this device only.
System messages of this chat would appear here
This view shows only system and info messages. Useful for finding the last chat actions without scrolling through many normal messages.
Are you sure you want to visit %1$s?

You followed a link which could be misrepresenting characters by using similarly looking ones from different alphabets. Following the link labelled %1$s will lead to %2$s which is normal for non-Latin characters. If you did not expect such characters this link could be harmful
Search for chats, contacts, and messages
Please enter a name for the group.
You must be a member of the group to perform this action.
Images and videos shared in this chat will be displayed here.
Documents, music and other files shared in this chat will be displayed here.
The messenger with the broadest audience in the world. Free and independent.
Log in with an existing e-mail account
For known e-mail providers additional settings are set up automatically. Sometimes IMAP needs to be enabled in the web settings. Consult your e-mail provider or friends for help.
There are no Delta Chat servers, your data stays on your device.

The entered e-mail address supports a simplified setup (OAuth 2.0).

In the next step, please allow Delta Chat to act as your Chat over E-mail app.

There are no Delta Chat servers, your data stays on your device.
Please enter a valid e-mail address
Please enter a valid server / IP address
Please enter a valid e-mail address and a password
Backup found at \"%1$s\".\n\nDo you want to import and use all data and settings from it?
No backups found.\n\nCopy the backup to \"%1$s\" and try again. Alternatively, press \"Start messaging\" to continue with the normal setup process.
Cannot login as \"%1$s\". Please check if the e-mail address and the password are correct.
Are you sure you want to delete your account data?
All account data of \"%s\" on this device will be deleted, including your end-to-end encryption setup, contacts, chats, messages and media. This action cannot be undone.
Send %1$d files to the selected chat?\n\nThe files are sent unmodified in their original size, eg. images and videos are not recoded.
Send %1$d file(s) to %2$d chats?\n\nThe files are sent unmodified in their original size, eg. images and videos are not recoded.
Sharing aborted due to missing permissions.
If you block contacts, they will be shown here.
Your profile image, name and signature will be sent together with your messages when communicating with other users.
Sent with my Delta Chat Messenger: https://delta.chat
Pressing the Enter key will send text messages
Request to block screenshots in the recents list and inside the app
To apply the screen security setting please restart the app.
Enable system notifications for new messages
Shows sender and first words of the message in notifications
Request keyboard to disable personalized learning
If read receipts are disabled, you won\'t be able to see read receipts from others.
Turn off Delta Chat\'s built-in emoji support
Back Up Chats to External Storage

A backup helps you to set up a new installation on this or on another device.\n\nThe backup will contain all messages, contacts and chats and your end-to-end Autocrypt setup. Keep the backup file in a safe place or delete it as soon as possible.

Import secret keys from "%1$s"?

‚Ä¢ Existing secret keys will not be deleted

‚Ä¢ The last imported key will be used as the new default key unless it has the word "legacy" in its filename.
If you disable this option, make sure, your server and your other clients are configured accordingly.\n\nOtherwise things may not work at all.
Chat conversations are moved to avoid cluttering the Inbox
Up to %1$s, most worse quality images
Up to %1$s, most balanced quality images

Do you want to delete %1$d messages now and all newly fetched messages "%2$s" in the future?

‚Ä¢ This includes all media

‚Ä¢ Messages will be deleted whether they were seen or not

‚Ä¢ "Saved messages" will be skipped from local deletion

Do you want to delete %1$d messages now and all newly fetched messages "%2$s" in the future?

‚ö†Ô∏è This includes e-mails, media and "Saved messages" in all server folders

‚ö†Ô∏è Do not use this function if you want to keep data on the server

‚ö†Ô∏è Do not use this function if you are using other e-mail clients besides Delta Chat
This includes e-mails, media and \"Saved messages\" in all server folders. Do not use this function if you want to keep data on the server or if you are using other e-mail clients besides Delta Chat.
I understand, delete all these messages

Autocrypt is a new and open specification for automatic end-to-end e-mail encryption.\n\nYour end-to-end setup is created automatically as needed and you can transfer it between devices with Autocrypt Setup Messages.

An Autocrypt Setup Message securely shares your end-to-end setup with other Autocrypt-compliant apps.\n\nThe setup will be encrypted by a setup code displayed here and must be typed on the other device.
Your setup has been sent to yourself. Switch to the other device and open the setup message. You should be asked for a setup code. Enter the following digits:\n\n%1$s

This is the Autocrypt Setup Message used to transfer your end-to-end setup between clients.\n\nTo decrypt and use your setup, open the message in an Autocrypt-compliant client and enter the setup code presented on the generating device.
This is the Autocrypt Setup Message used to transfer your end-to-end setup between clients.\n\nTo decrypt and use your setup, tap or click on this message.
Please enter the setup code displayed on the other device.
End-to-end setup transferred. This device is now ready to use Autocrypt with the same setup as the other device.
Bad setup code. Please try again.\n\nIf you do not remember the setup code, send a new Autocrypt Setup Message from the other device.
The \"%1$s\" message you sent was displayed on the screen of the recipient.\n\nThis is no guarantee the content was read.

This message cannot be decrypted.

‚Ä¢ It might already help to simply reply to this message and ask the sender to send the message again.

‚Ä¢ In case you re-installed Delta Chat or another e-mail program on this or another device you may want to send an Autocrypt Setup Message from there.
Unknown sender for this chat. See \'info\' for more details.
Disappearing messages timer set to %1$s s.
Disappearing messages timer set to 1 minute.
Disappearing messages timer set to 1 hour.
Disappearing messages timer set to 1 day.
Disappearing messages timer set to 1 week.
Disappearing messages timer set to 4 weeks.
Disappearing messages timer set to %1$s minutes.
Disappearing messages timer set to %1$s hours.
Disappearing messages timer set to %1$s days.
Disappearing messages timer set to %1$s weeks.
You deleted the \"Saved messages\" chat.\n\n‚ÑπÔ∏è To use the \"Saved messages\" feature again, create a new chat with yourself.

‚ö†Ô∏è Your provider's storage is about to exceed, already %1$s%% are used.

You may not be able to receive message when the storage is 100%% used.

üëâ Please check if you can delete old data in the provider's web interface and consider to enable "Settings / Delete Old Messages". You can check your current storage usage anytime at "Settings / Connectivity".
‚ö†Ô∏è Date or time of your device seem to be inaccurate (%1$s).\n\nAdjust your clock ‚è∞üîß to ensure your messages are received correctly.

‚ö†Ô∏è Your Delta Chat version might be outdated.

This may cause problems because your chat partners use newer versions - and you are missing the latest features üò≥
Please check https://get.delta.chat or your app store for updates.
Please enter your system defined secret to continue.
Hold your camera over the QR code.
QR code could not be decoded
Do you want to join the group \"%1$s\"?
The scanned fingerprint does not match the last seen for %1$s.
This QR code contains a fingerprint but no e-mail address.\n\nFor an out-of-band-verification, please establish an encrypted connection to the recipient first.
This QR code can be scanned by others to contact you.\n\nYou can deactivate the QR code here and reactivate it by scanning it again.
This QR code can be scanned by others to join the group \"%1$s\".\n\nYou can deactivate the QR code here and reactivate it by scanning it again.
This QR code could be scanned by others to contact you.\n\nThe QR code is not active on this device.
This QR code could be scanned by others to join the group \"%1$s\".\n\nThe QR code is not active on this device.
No internet connection, can\'t perform QR code setup.
Create new e-mail address on \"%1$s\" and log in there?
Create new e-mail address on \"%1$s\" and log in there?\n\nYour existing account will not be deleted. Use the \"Switch account\" item to switch between your accounts.
Login successful‚Äîyour e-mail address is %1$s\n\nIf you like, you can now enter a name and an profile image that will be displayed to people you write to.
The scanned QR code cannot be used to set up a new account.
The scanned QR code is for setting up a new account. You can scan the QR code when setting up a new Delta Chat installation.
%1$s invited you to join this group.\n\nWaiting for the device of %2$s to reply‚Ä¶
%1$s replied, waiting for being added to the group‚Ä¶
Verified groups (experimental) provide safety against active attacks. Members are verified with a second factor by other members and messages are always end-to-end-encrypted.
Select chat to send the message to
%1$s already has a draft message, do you want to replace it?
mailto link could not be decoded: %1$s
To take photos or capture videos, go to the app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\".
To send audio messages, go to the app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\".
To recieve or send files, go to the app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\".
To attach a location, go to the app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Location\".
This is the official Delta Chat Desktop app.
This software is licensed under GNU GPL version 3 and the source code is available on GitHub.
Select a chat or create a new chat
An Autocrypt Setup Message securely shares your end-to-end setup with other Autocrypt-compliant apps. The setup will be encrypted by a setup code displayed here and must be typed on the other device.
Your key has been sent to yourself. Switch to the other device and open the setup message. You should be asked for a setup code. Enter the following digits:
Incorrect setup code. Please try again.
Delete this login? Everything will be deleted, including your end-to-end setup, contacts, chats, messages and media. This action cannot be undone.
Tray icon cannot be disabled as Delta Chat was started with the --minimized option.
SOCKS5 support is currently experimental. Please use at your own risk. If you type in an address in the e-mail field, there will be DNS lookup that won\'t get tunneled through SOCKS5.
Delta Chat uses your camera to take and send photos and videos and to scan QR codes.
Delta Chat uses your contacts to show a list of e-mail addresses you can write to. Delta Chat has no server, your contacts are not sent anywhere.
Delta Chat uses your microphone to record and send voice messages and videos with sound.
Delta Chat will let you choose which photos from your library to send.
Delta Chat wants to save images to your photo library.
Uses a background connection to your server and requires ignored battery optimizations.

To maintain connection to your e-mail server and receive messages in the background, ignore battery optimizations in the next step.\n\nDelta Chat uses few resources and takes care not to drain your battery.
Tap here to receive messages while Delta Chat is in the background.
You already allowed Delta Chat to receive messages in the background.\n\nIf messages still do not arrive in background, please also check your system settings.

1.24 at a glance:

‚Ä¢ Save taps: Account selection in the upper left corner of the chat list
‚Ä¢ Save more taps: Long-tap the app icon to open recent chats directly
‚Ä¢ Save traffic: Download large files as needed
‚Ä¢ Save nerves: faster, non-blocking QR code joins and new QR code options

More at üëâ

1.24 at a glance:

‚Ä¢ Start an in-chat search from the chat's profile
‚Ä¢ Save traffic: Download large files as needed
‚Ä¢ Save nerves: faster, non-blocking QR code joins

More at üëâ

1.26 polishing üíÖ

‚Ä¢ After making the QR codes non-blocking in 1.24, they also look much nicer now - on all platforms
‚Ä¢ Avatars and badges look similar across platform
‚Ä¢ Lots of bugs fixed
